value.name: Sheriff: Deputy’s body cam not working when he shot man
value.description: Monongalia County Sheriff Perry Palmer issued that statement in response to a request by The Dominion Post for body camera footage from the deputy who killed John Stewart Jr. on April 17.

value.name: Biden condemns US gun violence as an ‘international embarrassment’ as he announces new actions – live
value.description: “I get up at 5am and I’m usually out here a little after 7am every day,” John Stewart Jr, 57, said ... The trial of the white former Minneapolis police officer, Derek Chauvin, charged ...
